name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the woman said that after she released the real-name reporting video, the family of the person being reported was spending money to smooth over relationships

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Someone from V2EX shared his experience of being called by the police while using FaceTime. 
As early as two months ago, someone revealed that a special anti-fraud emergency update for FaceTime was added when the Chinese version of iOS 17.5.1 was updated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the Paris Olympics, a Kim Jong-un impersonator beat up Winnie the Pooh in front of the North Korean team.
@KimJongUnDouble

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 9, Qingdao, Shandong. A female tour guide from Runner International Travel Agency said on the Internet that "If you are poor, don't come out. It's your fault if you come out. Sichuan people are very stingy. They only understood life after the Wenchuan earthquake killed 300,000 people." 
Official announcement: Set up an investigation team immediately to investigate!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, the movie "Devote My Life to the Party" was released. As of now, according to Maoyan box office data, the movie has accumulated a box office of 1.269 million. Netizens responded, "I don't understand. If 98 million party members go to watch and learn, carry forward the revolutionary spirit, and each person contributes a 50-yuan ticket, there will be nearly 5 billion box office."
